languages.text: {n}Понизив голос, солдат весомо добавляет:{/n} "В штабе о таком говорить не велено, но шепчутся, будто чушь эта не простая, а самая что ни на есть еретическая. Потому как если послушать ее, мозги здорово перекручиваются. Один караульный так наслушался, что остолбенел, и слепые его с поста на руках утащили неведомо куда".

{n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."
languages.original_text: {n}Понизив голос, солдат весомо добавляет:{/n} "В штабе о таком говорить не велено, но шепчутся, будто чушь эта не простая, а самая что ни на есть еретическая. Потому как если послушать ее, мозги здорово перекручиваются. Один караульный так наслушался, что остолбенел, и слепые его с поста на руках утащили неведомо куда".

traits.locale_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just your regular nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brains right up. It made one patrolman freeze where he stood, and the blind mob just grabbed him from his post and carried who knows where."

Because listening to it scrambles your brains right up. It made one patrolman freeze where he stood, and the blind mob just grabbed him from his post and carried who knows where."

Because listening to it scrambles your brains right up. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks, while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post who knows where."

Because listening to it scrambles your brains right up. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks, while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post who knows where."

{n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

{n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

languages.text: {n}Er senkt die Stimme und fügt ernst hinzu:{/n} "Die Befehlshaber wollen nicht, dass man darüber redet, aber angeblich ist es nicht nur wirres Zeug, sondern Ketzerei, echte Ketzerei. Wenn man nämlich zuhört, dann verliert man den Verstand. Ein Soldat auf Patrouille ist plötzlich stocksteif stehengeblieben und der blinde Mob hat ihn wer weiß wohin getragen."
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er senkt die Stimme und fügt ernst hinzu:{/n} "Die Befehlshaber wollen nicht, dass man darüber redet, aber angeblich ist es nicht nur wirres Zeug, sondern Ketzerei, echte Ketzerei. Wenn man nämlich zuhört, dann verliert man den Verstand. Ein Soldat auf Patrouille ist plötzlich stocksteif stehengeblieben und der blinde Mob hat ihn wer weiß wohin getragen."

languages.text: {n}Il baisse la voix et ajoute avec gravité :{/n} « Le haut-commandement refuse que l'on en parle, mais j'ai entendu dire que ce n'était pas des insanités... mais bel et bien de l'hérésie ! Il semble qu'écouter ces piaillements vous secoue le cerveau, ça a littéralement figé un soldat sur place. La foule d'hérétiques en a profité pour se jeter sur lui et l'a emmené je-ne-sais-où. »
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il baisse la voix et ajoute avec gravité :{/n} « Le haut-commandement refuse que l'on en parle, mais j'ai entendu dire que ce n'était pas des insanités... mais bel et bien de l'hérésie ! Il semble qu'écouter ces piaillements vous secoue le cerveau, ça a littéralement figé un soldat sur place. La foule d'hérétiques en a profité pour se jeter sur lui et l'a emmené je-ne-sais-où. »

languages.text: {n}他压低声音，严肃地补充道，{/n}“总督下令不许任何人谈论那些胡话，但我听到传言说，那些并不是简简单单的胡话，而是真正的异端邪说。光是听到它，脑子就会变得浑浑噩噩。有个警卫被吓丢了魂，那群瞎了眼的暴民趁机抓住了他，把他从岗哨上拖了出去，没人知道他被带到哪儿去了。”
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

traits.locale_text: {n}他压低声音，严肃地补充道，{/n}“总督下令不许任何人谈论那些胡话，但我听到传言说，那些并不是简简单单的胡话，而是真正的异端邪说。光是听到它，脑子就会变得浑浑噩噩。有个警卫被吓丢了魂，那群瞎了眼的暴民趁机抓住了他，把他从岗哨上拖了出去，没人知道他被带到哪儿去了。”

languages.text: {n}青年は声をひそめて重々しくつけ加える。{/n}「司令官は、この件について誰にも話してほしくないんです。でも、僕はささやき声を聞きました。わけのわからない言葉なんかじゃない…異端者です。本物の異端者。そいつを聞くと、すぐに頭がぐちゃぐちゃになりますよ。ある巡回兵なんて、その場で凍りついたんです。その上、盲目の暴徒は彼を捕まえて、どこかへ連れてってしまいました」
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

traits.locale_text: {n}青年は声をひそめて重々しくつけ加える。{/n}「司令官は、この件について誰にも話してほしくないんです。でも、僕はささやき声を聞きました。わけのわからない言葉なんかじゃない…異端者です。本物の異端者。そいつを聞くと、すぐに頭がぐちゃぐちゃになりますよ。ある巡視員なんて、その場で凍りついたんです。その上、盲目の暴徒は彼を捕まえて、どこかへ連れてってしまいました」

languages.text: {n}Baja la voz y añade con seriedad,{/n} «El mando no quiere que nadie hable de ello, pero he oído rumores de que no se trata de una tontería, sino de herejía, de auténtica herejía. Porque escucharlo te fríe el cerebro. Hizo que un guardia se quedara paralizado, mientras la multitud lo atrapaba y se lo llevaba de su puesto quién sabe adónde».
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

traits.locale_text: {n}Baja la voz y añade con seriedad,{/n} «El mando no quiere que nadie hable de ello, pero he oído rumores de que no se trata de una tontería, sino de herejía, de auténtica herejía. Porque escucharlo te destroza el cerebro. Hizo que un guardia se quedara paralizado, mientras la multitud lo atrapaba y se lo llevaba de su puesto quién sabe adónde».

languages.text: {n}Sesini alçaltıp ciddiyetle ekliyor.{/n} "Komutanlar bu konunun açılmasını istemiyor ama öyle düz isyan değilmiş diye duydum. Kâfirlik diyorlar, hakiki kâfirlik. Dinlemek, insanın beynini bulandırıyormuş. Devriyenin biri volta atarken kör güruhu görüp kaskatı kesilmiş, onlar da yakasına yapışıp görev yerinden alıp götürmüş. Kim bilir nereye?"
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and adds with gravity,{/n} "The command doesn't want anyone to talk about it, but I've heard whispers that it's not just some nonsense — it's heresy, actual heresy. Because listening to it scrambles your brain. It made one patrolman freeze in his tracks while the blind mob got hold of him and carried him from his post off to who knows where."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesini alçaltıyor ve ciddiyetle ekliyor:{/n} "Komutanlar bu konunun açılmasını istemiyor ama öyle düz isyan değilmiş diye duydum. Kâfirlik diyorlar, hakiki kâfirlik. Dinlemek, insanın beynini bulandırıyormuş. Devriyenin biri volta atarken kör güruhu görüp kaskatı kesilmiş, onlar da yakasına yapışıp görev yerinden alıp götürmüş. Kim bilir nereye?"
